name: Sonic Vulnerability
text: Flip Symbiotic Bond to its [[bonded ]]side. Treat the printed text box of Symbiotic Bond as if it were blank. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Eddie Brock and take 1 damage → discard this obligation.

name: Fire Vulnerability
text:
If Symbiotic Bond is [[bonded]], take 2 indirect damage. Discard this obligation.
If Symbiotic Bond is attached to an ally, deal 3 damage to that ally. Discard this obligation.

name: Maximum Carnage
text: Carnage and his lover Shriek are committing a murder spree across Manhattan. Venom and Spider-Man reluctantly agree to work together to stop his rampage. Hinder 2[per_hero]. Assault. When Defeated: Deal 1 damage to each hero. [crisis]

name: Carnage
text: Villainous. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Carnage would scheme against you, he attacks an ally you control instead, if able. (Venom's nemesis minion.) “I'M GOING TO PAINT THE TOWN RED!!!!”

name: Shriek
text: Villainous. Patrol. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Shriek attacks, if Carnage is in play, give her 1 additional boost card for this activation. “My sonic scream didn't hurt you, did it? I get angry when someone's hurting my man...”

name: Sonic Boom
text: When Revealed: Either spend [energy][mental][physical] resources or exhaust each character you control. [star] Boost: If this activation deals damage to you, exhaust your hero.

name: Paint the Town Red
text: Attach to Carnage. If you cannot, attach to a minion. Forced Interrupt: After attached minion attacks you, deal 1 damage to each character you control. [star] Boost: Deal 1 damage to each character you control.
